articles.title: Salon Owner Anne Heche Visited Before Fatal Crash Feels Guilt, Anger - TMZ
articles.description: The salon owner Anne Heche visited before her fatal crash is shaken up over her death and denying accusations he gave her drugs.
articles.content: Richard Glass may have been the last person to see Anne Heche before she careened into a house in her car ... and he's riddled with guilt because he didn't save her -- he's also furious at people on … [+695 chars]
